metadata.title: CVE-2024-36959 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: devicetree: fix refcount leak in pinctrl_dt_to_map() If we fail toallocate propname buffer, we need to drop the reference count we just took.Because the pinctrl_dt_free_maps() includes the droping operation, here wecall it directly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
